We invite you to discover the Gospel in an original form without any filter. An opportunity to discover for yourself who Jesus was.  You will have the perspective of 4 people who have been close to Jesus: - Luke was a doctor who decided to investigate what really happened to people who knew Jesus. He really uses the method of a historian. - Mark was Peters assistant who was also one of the twelve companions of Jesus. He was one of the closest. - Matthew was one of the twelve companions of Jesus, he was a tax collector. John was also one of the twelve and probably the closest to Jesus.  The unique experience that we propose, and that may be new to you, is to explore each day, for 90 days, a chapter of one of the 4 Gospels in the form of a short video.
